definition: betel nut beauty: a skimpily-dressed, attractive girl who sells betel nut from a glass-walled roadside booth (Tw)

sentences.english: Local people like to chew it, especially at a wedding.
sentences.chinese: 本地人喜歡嚼檳榔，尤其在婚禮上。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the molluscieidal effect of Areca catechu on Oncomelania hupen-sis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察檳榔提取物殺滅釘螺的效果。

sentences.english: For schistosomiasis: xiong huang with nan gua zi (pumpkin seeds), bin nang.
sentences.chinese: 血吸蟲病，可與南瓜子，檳榔等同用。

sentences.english: Conclusions The areca processing could affect reproduction function of female workers.
sentences.chinese: 結論檳榔加工作業對女工生殖功能有影響。

sentences.english: The preparation of beverages such as betel nut, to prevent the occurrence of severe malaria disease.
sentences.chinese: 如用檳榔配製飲料，可預防瘴氣重而發生的疾病。

sentences.english: The active sites of Akebia quinala (Thunb. ) Dence. and Areca catechu L are N butanol extracts.
sentences.chinese: 木通和檳榔的活性部位爲正丁醇提取物。

sentences.english: Clinical observation on curative effect of compound areca gargle on dental plaque and gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 複方檳榔含漱液對控制菌斑和消除牙齦炎療效觀察。

sentences.english: Content of arecoline had not positive linear correlation with composition of nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 檳榔鹼含量與營養成分間無顯著相關性。

sentences.english: I don't know what the meaning of the betel leaf and betel nut are.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道那個荖藤和檳榔的意義是什麼？

sentences.english: Check out the betel-nut stand near the corner, and try some if you dare.
sentences.chinese: 如果你夠膽量，就試試角落裏的那家檳榔攤。

sentences.english: Objective To study the killing mechanism of decoction of areca and pumpkin seeds on Taenia solium .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究檳榔南瓜子合劑對豬帶絛蟲的殺蟲機理。

sentences.english: Arecoline is the main function component of betelnut.
sentences.chinese: 檳榔鹼是檳榔的最主要功效成分。

sentences.english: Arecoline is the main function component of betelnut.
sentences.chinese: 檳榔鹼是檳榔的最主要功效成分。

sentences.english: Arecoline is mostly used to cure infection of animals'parasites on veterinary surgeon clinic.
sentences.chinese: 在獸醫臨牀上，檳榔鹼主要用於治療動物的絛蟲感染。

sentences.english: ObjectiveSet up the method to detect the content of Arecoline hydrobromide in Tongfeng oral liquid.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立痛風口服液中檳榔鹼的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: And what made you decide to start taking pictures of betel nut girls?
sentences.chinese: 什麼讓你決定去拍檳榔西施的？

definition: Yangmei town in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
red bayberry/Chinese bayberry/Japanese bayberry/Myrica rubra/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
